name: Trirual
description:
This is a three player coop puzzle game made in the global game jam 2016 in wich you have to coordinate with your friends to and defend the core. Learning the rules as you go is the only way to complete this game. One key per person is advised :D.

Credits:
Coding/Game Design: @federicoDETP
Coding/UI/Game Design: @adriannovell
Art: @arteAyuGarcia
Sound Design: @Sudsonic
